name: Bank Trans vs GL Entry Report
query:
SELECT 
  dt.date AS "Date:Date:",
  IFNULL(bank.bank_txn_count, 0) AS "Bank Trans Count:Int:",
  IFNULL(gl.gl_txn_count, 0) AS "GL Trans Count:Int:",
  (IFNULL(bank.bank_txn_count, 0) - IFNULL(gl.gl_txn_count, 0)) AS "Count Difference:Int:",
  IFNULL(bank.bank_total, 0) AS "Bank Total:Float:",
  IFNULL(gl.gl_total, 0) AS "GL Total:Float:",
  (IFNULL(bank.bank_total, 0) - IFNULL(gl.gl_total, 0)) AS "Total Difference:Float:",
  IFNULL(bank.bank_deposit, 0) AS "Bank Deposit:Float:",
  IFNULL(gl.gl_deposit, 0) AS "GL Deposit:Float:",
  (IFNULL(bank.bank_deposit, 0) - IFNULL(gl.gl_deposit, 0)) AS "Deposit Difference:Float:",
  IFNULL(bank.bank_withdrawal, 0) AS "Bank Withdrawal:Float:",
  IFNULL(gl.gl_withdrawal, 0) AS "GL Withdrawal:Float:",
  (IFNULL(bank.bank_withdrawal, 0) - IFNULL(gl.gl_withdrawal, 0)) AS "Withdrawal Difference:Float:"
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT bt.date as date FROM `tabBank Transaction` bt WHERE bt.date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s AND docstatus = 1 AND bt.bank_account = %(bank_account)s
  UNION
  SELECT DISTINCT gli.posting_date as date
      FROM `tabGL Entry` gli
      INNER JOIN `tabBank Account` ba ON gli.account = ba.account
      WHERE gli.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
        AND ba.name = %(bank_account)s
        AND gli.is_cancelled = 0
  ) AS dt
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
  -- Bank query
  SELECT 
    bt.date AS txn_date,
    COUNT(*) AS bank_txn_count,
    SUM(bt.deposit - bt.withdrawal) AS bank_total,
    SUM(bt.deposit) AS bank_deposit,
    SUM(bt.withdrawal) AS bank_withdrawal
  FROM `tabBank Transaction` bt
  WHERE bt.date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND bt.bank_account = %(bank_account)s
    AND bt.docstatus = 1
  GROUP BY bt.date
) AS bank ON dt.date = bank.txn_date
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
  -- GL query
  SELECT 
    gl.posting_date AS txn_date,
    COUNT(*) AS gl_txn_count,
    SUM(gl.debit_in_account_currency - gl.credit_in_account_currency) AS gl_total,
    SUM(gl.debit_in_account_currency) AS gl_deposit,
    SUM(gl.credit_in_account_currency) AS gl_withdrawal
  FROM `tabGL Entry` gl
  INNER JOIN `tabBank Account` ba ON gl.account = ba.account
  WHERE gl.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND ba.name = %(bank_account)s
    AND gl.is_cancelled = 0
  GROUP BY gl.posting_date
) AS gl
ON dt.date = gl.txn_date
ORDER BY 1
report_name: Bank Trans vs GL Entry Report
